question: What options are available for adjusting voicemail settings on Apple devices?
contexts: ['- Hallo@AlphaTom,ich habe unsere Technik dazu befragt. Die Antwort lautete von uns, dass Apple bei allen Ger√§ten die neue eigene Box aktiviert hat.Die springt also direkt an. ground_truth: The options available for adjusting voicemail settings on Apple devices include going to Settings - Phone - Voicemail and setting the slider to Deactivate. This allows the use of the previously booked Telekom box instead of the new Apple box.
